refined_topic: How Does the Human Body Fight Off Germs?
learning_objectives: Learn about the immune system and its role in keeping us healthy
Understand what germs are and how they can make us sick
Discover the different types of immune cells like white blood cells
Learn why washing hands and staying healthy helps our immune system
key_points: Germs are tiny living things we can't see without a microscope
Our skin is the first line of defense against germs
White blood cells are like soldiers that fight germs inside our body
When we get sick, our body creates antibodies to remember the germ
Vaccines help train our immune system to fight diseases
Eating healthy food and sleeping well keeps our immune system strong
Washing hands is one of the best ways to stop germs from spreading
